results.name: n^a(n) is smallest power of n (with a(n) > 1) which starts with n.
comment: A070327(n) = n^a(n) for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 29 2011
The largest of the first 10000 terms is a(1955) = 119589011. - _Giovanni Resta_, May 27 2016
link: Reinhard Zumkeller and Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (first 275 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller)
results.author: _Michel ten Voorde_
